faq.title: FAQ
faq.q1: How do you guarantee property quality?
faq.a1: All properties on the platform undergo thorough verification to ensure authenticity and accurate descriptions. We work only with trusted developers and brokers who meet high-quality standards.
faq.q2: What fees might arise when renting or buying?
faq.a2: All potential fees and additional charges are disclosed upfront by brokers and fully transparent for clients. We guarantee no surprises.
faq.q3: How does the ROI calculator for investors work?
faq.a3: Our ROI calculator helps investors estimate the potential profitability of renting out a property. It takes into account various parameters such as rental costs, taxes, maintenance costs and other important information. It allows you to compare profitability across different areas and types of property.
faq.q4: How quickly can I find the right property?
faq.a4: Thanks to our AI chat and professional brokers, finding properties on Real In is fast and efficient. Average search time ranges from a few hours to a few days, depending on your preferences.
